duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize network and sourcing tools to map out the IT talent landscape and identify potential candidates.
Reach out to passive candidates with compelling messages to spark genuine interest in the opportunities offered.
Conduct initial assessments to gauge candidates' technical skills and cultural fit.
Partner with the recruitment team to align on client needs and understand client requirements.
Recommend innovative sourcing strategies to stay ahead of the game in the ever-evolving tech world.

education_certification.credential: Proven experience in technical sourcing, ideally in the IT domain.
Familiarity with various sourcing tools and techniques to identify hidden talent gems.
Tech-savviness – you don't just speak tech; you live it!
A team player attitude – all about collaboration and lifting each other up.
